name: .BFE File Extension
summary: Learn about .BFE files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: Because BFE files are encrypted, you cannot open them as you would a normal file. To decrypt a BFE file, you must use bcrypt (cross-platform) and the passphrase used to encrypt the file. After you've decrypted the file, you should be able to open it normally.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
